hero.title: Discover the World of Machine Learning
hero.description: A student initiative for anyone interested in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

stroke_prediction.name: Predict Strokes
stroke_prediction.description: Develop a machine learning model that predicts whether a person is at risk of having a stroke based on patient data. The dataset includes demographic characteristics, health factors, and lifestyle information. The goal is to make accurate predictions and develop effective models for data imbalance.

2025_march.description: Outstanding performance in developing an innovative CNN architecture with 98.5% accuracy.

neural_networks.title: Neural Networks
neural_networks.description: Learn the fundamentals of neural networks

material_1.title: Fundamentals of AI
material_1.description: Introduction to the key concepts of artificial intelligence.

material_2.title: Python Basics
material_2.description: Programming fundamentals for machine learning with Python.

material_3.title: Data Science
material_3.description: Data analysis and visualization for ML projects.

about.title: About Our Initiative
about.description_1: We are a group of students passionate about machine learning and artificial intelligence. Our goal is to share knowledge and learn together.
about.description_2: In regular meetings, we exchange ideas, work on projects, and support each other in learning.
